EmailTemplate.name: 201907_APAC_Event_HOC_KualaLumpur_Xiamen_MC.201907_APAC_Event_HOC_KualaLumpur_Xi
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: 2019 Honeywell Operator Conferences in Asia Pacific
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
October 08-09 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia October 15-16 Xiamen, China We are back! Honeywell Airlines Aftermarket will be hosting two Operator Conferences in Asia and we are inviting all our airlines customers to join this two-day workshop. Each venue's conference will cover keynotes on:
- Technical and Reliability Updates - Predictive Maintenance and Big Data Analytics - Advancing Aviation Safety with Technology - Flight Efficiency & Optimization - Customer Support updates.
We will send a more detailed agenda closer of the topics will be shared nearer to date. Our Technical Experts from across the globe will be leading these discussions and we look forward to all operators joining this exciting event. Watch this space...
